page.title: 20Favourite Meals cont.
page.content:
My best meal is one my Mum makes. It is a French meal called chicken chasseur. I have it with rice and vegatables. Paul Berrelly age 11. My Nan's steak and kidney pie is smashing. I like it with chips and baked beans. Darren Roffey age 10. I like shepherd's pie with carr- ots and peas. Matthew Tilley age 11. I like beef the best. I have beef when I go out, and on Sundays when I come home from my Nan's. I like pork as well. Paul Edwards age 10.
{The most popular school dinner}is spam, chips and salad. Ice cream or apple crumble is favourite for dessert. Jelly is a close second. {Crisps and chocolate}are universal favourites in the{packed {lunches}the children bring to school.
